game.name: Animals Memory: Underwater Kingdom
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Animals Memory: Underwater Kingdom is a card game with images of various underwater animals that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Animals Memory: Underwater Kingdom is a card game with images of various underwater animals that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards.
